name: Interwoven Stories -  Vol. 1
title: Composer | Album
description:
This portfolio album showcases a dynamic blend of musical styles. I wanted to push my ability from writing big symphonic sections to cozy, intimate pieces that come together seamlessly. This album started production in 2022 and finished in 2023 and is incredibly special to me being my favorite collection of music that I’ve currently written.

I worked with many of my close friends to bring this album to life, featuring numerous musicians and vocalists recorded at home or remotely. I also collaborated with mixing engineer Michael Yang and artist Alonso Urmeneta to bring this project together. I filmed and edited the music videos.

The first track, “Once Upon A Time” acts as the grand opening for the project, interweaving vocals performed by my friend Krystal Laplante and full symphonic statements using a virtual orchestra. The tracks, “Wind and Ruined Walkways” and “The Challengers” are video game-inspired pieces based on background and battle music respectively. Featuring cello performed by Polina Faustov. “A Moment With You” is a jazz track reminiscent of old jazz standards. “Afternoon On Weekends” is a waltz and “I Might Fly” is a cottage-core song with authentic performances from all my best friends.

name: Toaster Fish
title: Composer & SFX | Video Game
description:
A short golf-like video game for the alternative controller showcase at GDC 2023, in which the player uses a toaster as a controller to launch a fish.

I was tasked to write the music and the sound effects in only a couple of hours. Despite the rushed work, many composers and developers at GDC 2023 commented positively on the music and sound design. I used WWise for audio integration.

Contact me for a download to play

name: Ma Mao
title: Composer & SFX | Short Film
description:
I composed, produced, and mixed the music and sound design for the award-winning animated short film, 'Ma Mao' by the Algonquin College Animation Team, directed by Thanh Ngo.

The film won Best International Student Short Film in 2D at the 2024 Los Angeles Animation Festival, Best Screenplay Award at Xinê Xem Fest 2024 in Vietnam, and was officially selected in Spark Animation 2024 festival in Vancouver.

I was brought onto the film early in production so the music and visuals are directly linked to tell the film's story. I got to record myself playing the accordion and most of the film's sound effects and foley were recorded in my home.

name: True Blood
title: Composer & SFX | Video Game
description:
True Blood is an indie game for a friend’s thesis project in 2024. The game is a metroidvania in the likes of Hollow Knight and Ori and the Will of the Wisps.

I composed the music and the sound effects for the game, taking inspiration from the games mentioned above. I was tasked to write a title, area, battle, and town theme. Since the game was a short experience, I stuck to one musical motif and expanded on it in different ways. I integrated the music using FMOD.

Contact me for a download to play.

name: First Day At Tony's
title: Assistant Composer & SFX | Video Game
description:
A game jam project made in only 48 hours. The game is based around a cozy pizzeria where you need to decipher hand written notes to make the correct pizza order.

The music was largely written by a friend of mine, Ryan Liberty. I helped assist in composition, production, and quality assurance.

Available to play on Itch.io

name: Awakening
title: Composer | Single
description:
A track that was composed in a day for a Halloween event.

I was influenced by Castlevania and noir style tracks and tried my hand at it. Near the end it also turns into a rock track for fun lol.
